query:
SELECT u.email, cu.role, c.name as company_name
FROM company_users cu
JOIN users u ON cu.user_id = u.id
JOIN companies c ON cu.company_id = c.id
WHERE c.id = 1 AND u.email LIKE '%jhemison%'
ORDER BY u.email;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2RJ6pkiYcWrkG7s.7677514b54b3 --database AdJ4NUusdiWEA7xpHs45nc --execute
